name: Supper Army Cargo Hill Road
description:
Supper Army Cargo Hill Road is the most exhilarating offroad army transport game and transport simulator with mind-blowing 3D features, high tech army transport and cargo transport missions.

features :

- Army Truck Simulation
- Thrilling Gameplay Missions
- Explore the Hill Side off road Environment
- Perform your Duty as Army truck Driver
- Realistic environment with 3D Graphics to show the real life simulation
